output.sentences: There was a fun ring toss at last night's jubilee celebrations.
My little sister loved to ride the indoor car!
She was in love with the ball pit but had to leave it early since it was infested with bugs!
She felt better when we passed a candy machine of which she was mesmerized with the variety of candies!
The only part I didn't enjoy myself was the Ferris Wheel ride; I look so terrified in the picture!
